mapper.insert: INERT INTO DEVICE_LOGIN_LOG ( LOG_CODE, DEVICE_CODE, DEVICE_SN, DEVICE_STATUS, SW_NAME, SW_VERSION, LOGIN_TIME, REMARK, INSERT_CODE, INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_CODE ,UPDATE_DATE ) SELECT #{logCode}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceSn}, #{deviceStatus}, #{swName}, #{swVersion}, #{loginTime}, #{remark}, #{insertCode}, #{insertDate}, #{updateCode}, #{updateDate}
